long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allow users of Amazon Vine to: 
- Hide items 
- Fix the infinite loading wheel (Infinite Spinner) issue 
- Link to the (non-official) AmazonVine discord server
- View some ETV fees directly from the listing.
- View approximately when the products were published.
- Apply Thorvarium stylesheets 
- Auto sort products that are not available to order
- and much, much more!
